titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Billy Frank, Jr., and expressing condolences on his passing.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
6/4/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors the life, legacy, and accomplishments of Billy Frank, Jr.
Extends sympathy and condolences to the family of Billy Frank, Jr., the Nisqually Tribe, all Native Americans, and people around the world who were inspired by his example.
